meanings.sent1: The wrestler had a brawny physique.
meanings.sent2: He admired the brawny arms of the weightlifter.
meanings.sent3: The brawny construction worker effortlessly lifted heavy bricks.
meanings.sent4: Her brawny grip on the rope saved her from falling.
meanings.sent5: The brawny oak tree stood tall in the forest.

meanings.sent1: The superhero's brawny chest symbolized his strength.
meanings.sent2: She felt proud of her brawny legs after months of training.
meanings.sent3: The brawny dog wagged its tail happily after a long run.
meanings.sent4: His brawny shoulders carried the weight of the world.
meanings.sent5: The brawny horse galloped gracefully across the field.

meanings.sent1: The brawny firefighter rescued the kitten from the tree.
meanings.sent2: The brawny farmer effortlessly lifted the heavy bales of hay.
meanings.sent3: The brawny chef chopped vegetables with ease in the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: His brawny determination helped him overcome the obstacle.
meanings.sent5: The brawny lion roared loudly in the jungle.
